## ARTHReceipt type

One of either a [PendingReceipt](./arth-base.pendingreceipt.md)<!-- -->, a [FailedReceipt](./arth-base.failedreceipt.md) or a [SuccessfulReceipt](./arth-base.successfulreceipt.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ARTHReceipt<R = unknown, D = unknown> = PendingReceipt | MinedReceipt<R, D>;
```
<b>References:</b> [PendingReceipt](./arth-base.pendingreceipt.md)<!-- -->, [MinedReceipt](./arth-base.minedreceipt.md)
